  Item 8.01Other Events.On December 22,       
  2020, U.S. Bancorp announced that its       
  board of directors has approved an          
  authorization to repurchase up to $3        
  billion of its outstanding common stock     
  beginning on January 1, 2021. U.S. Bancorp  
  also announced that its board of directors  
  currently intends to maintain the           
  quarterly dividend on U.S. Bancorp common   
  stock of $0.42 per common share. A copy of  
  the press release is attached as Exhibit    
  99.1 hereto and is incorporated into this   
  Item 8.01 by reference.Item 9.01Financial   
  Statements and Exhibits.(d)                 
  Exhibits.99.1Press release dated December   
  22, 2020104Cover Page Interactive Data      
  File (embedded within the Inline XBRL       
  document)2

signed on its behalf by the undersigned       
hereunto duly authorized.                     
                                              
       U.S. BANCORP
